review.title: “Flexible and creative working environment”
review.pros: Pros – flexibility, lots of opportunities, easy to get to (on campus)
review.cons: Cons – 9-5PM, no weekend hours, minimum wage
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More vision

review.title: “Excellent”
review.pros: Pros – Good working environment. Hiring from within is a plus. Excellent benefits; holiday pay. All departments support each other. Overall great company.
review.cons: Cons – Payment raises are almost non-existent. You can grow in your position as far as ranking but you won't get paid for it.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Great experience nice people to work with”
review.pros: Pros – Everyone is nice and working as a student worker has lots of perks versus other college jobs such as nights and weekends off.
review.cons: Cons – If you're a student worker you'll probably never get a raise.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Nice people in a flawed system”
review.pros: Pros – Most everyone is very congenial and will be more than happy to assist with any problems you might have. State benefits.
review.cons: Cons – The system is very bureaucratic, as one would expect, and this leads to institutionalized inefficiency and entrenchment on the part of long-term employees.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give your departments more freedom to solve their own problems and stop piling up more "accountability" measures.

review.title: “Marketing Student Assistant for OIT”
review.pros: Pros – I absolutely loved working here. I left because I graduated and this is a student position. Everyone I worked with is wonderful. I learned so much about marketing and advertising. It was nice to have real-world experience before I started my career. Since it was a student position, my hours were very flexible. The pay was good for the position.
review.cons: Cons – Big job for just one student, but they have since hired two and split the responsibilities.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “My experience was nice.”
review.pros: Pros – Pros- Small friendly town, affordable food and housing, strong natural resources department, great programs for students, stable work, decent benefits overall
review.cons: Cons – Cons- Far away from any metropolitan area

review.title: “It's okay... if you're a student”
review.pros: Pros – It's easy if you're a student at SFASU
review.cons: Cons – Weird hours, low pay, pretty annoying employees and management
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Regular, normal schedules IS possible. Maybe you should seriously consider it.
